selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer as a single line output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the integer answer representing the total volume of the measuring cup.

new_skill_specs.name: read_volume_labels
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract and interpret the highest volume label from an image of a measuring cup.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or labels are not clear
Labels are in a different unit than expected
